DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess epidemiology Treatment Resistant Depression ( TRD ) nationally insured population Taiwan include incidence , duration clinical episode , prevalence age sex .
DOC.detailed_description: This retrospective study approximately one million subject randomly select anonymized database National Health Insurance Research Database ( NHIRD ) . Participants age 18 year old neither depression diagnosis dispense antidepressant medication last four month 2004 enter study receive 2005 depression diagnosis dispense antidepressant medication within 30 day follow 8 year 4 month neither depression diagnosis dispense antidepressant medication . Treatment Resistant Depression ( TRD ) Incidence , TRD prevalence age sex duration clinical episode estimate .
DOC.criteria: Participants continuously enrol insurance plan since January 1 , 2004 ( ignore breaks less 30 day ) receive exclusion diagnosis last 4 month 2004 , ) Have receive diagnosis depression b ) Have receive dispensing AD medication Participants diagnosis depressive disorder include dysthymic disorder ( International Classification Diseases [ ICD ] 9 code 296 depressionrelated , 300.4 , 311 ) Major Depressive Disorder ( ICD9 296.2 , 296.3 ) follow December 31 , 2013 Participants receive follow diagnosis exclude , ) Mania , b ) Schizophrenia ( ICD9 cod 295 ) , c ) Bipolar disorder ( ICD9 cod 296 bipolarrelated ) , D ) Dementia ( ICD9 cod 290 294 ) ; Note : Major depressive disorder ( MDD ) psychotic behavior ( ICD 296.24 single episode , ICD 296.34 recurrent episode ) exclusion
